title: Introduction to Data Analytics
description: This course will presents an Introduction to Data Analytics with R
bio: The material presented in this website was mainly developed by Stéphane Guerrier, Lionel Voirol and Yuming Zhang. Moreover, we thank Francesco Gervasio, Yiannis Galdadas, Julien Boccard, Dominique-Laurent Couturier, Wenfei Chu and Jun Wu for their valuable contributions.
